headline.main: Trump Supporter Who Made Nazi Salute Explains Why She Made the Gesture

snippet: Birgitt Peterson, who said she was the woman photographed making a Nazi salute, explained that she was not a Nazi sympathizer, but was angry with protesters comparing Donald Trump to Hitler.
abstract: Birgitt Peterson, who said she was the woman photographed making a Nazi salute, explained that she was not a Nazi sympathizer, but was angry with protesters comparing Donald Trump to Hitler.
